jbb.engine
Class NPC

java.lang.Object
  jbb.engine.Tile
      jbb.engine.Avatar
          jbb.engine.NPC
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ghost, Mouse
public abstract class NPC
extends Avatar

The NPC is an Avatar that generally has the primary goal of ruining the life of the hero by attempting to kill it. The NPC operates using A.I. to dodge walls and reach the hero.

Author:
Jonathan Gravel

Constructor Detail

NPC

public NPC(javax.swing.ImageIcon image,
           int lives,
           Position position,
           Board board)
Parameters:
image - pictorial representation of the NPC to be used on a Tile
lives - represents the starting number of lives of the NPC
position - represents the position of the NPC on the Board
board - represents the board that is associated to this NPC
Method Detail

getNextPosition

public Position getNextPosition(Position position)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
NPCs will move towards given position and find a way around obstructing walls. The current method defines stupid AI that may move repeatedly to the same position. This will be redefined later.

Overrides:
getNextPosition in class Avatar
Parameters:
position - to move to or towards
Returns:
Position calculated
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if move is out of bounds, or if the Avatar will move into a wall.
